pilots.name: "Chopper"
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0 gains 2 jam tokens.
pilots.shipability: Tail Gun: When you have a docked ship, you have a primary rear firing arc weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary forward firing arc attack value.

pilots.name: "Countdown"
pilots.ability: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if you are not stressed, you may suffer 1 hit damage and gain 1 stress token. If you do, cancel all dice results.
pilots.shipability: Adaptive Ailerons: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white 1 left bank, 1 straight, or 1 right bank maneuver.

pilots.name: "Deathfire"
pilots.ability: After you are destroyed, before you are removed, you may preform an attack and drop or launch 1 device.
pilots.shipability: Nimble Bomber: If you would drop a device using a straight template, you may use a left bank or right bank template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: "Deathrain"
pilots.ability: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform an action.

pilots.name: "Double Edge"
pilots.ability: After you perform a turret or missile attack that misses, you may perform a bonus attack using a different weapon.

pilots.name: "Duchess"
pilots.ability: You may choose not to use your Adaptive Ailerons.You may use your Adaptive Ailerons even while stressed.
pilots.shipability: Adaptive Ailerons: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white 1 left bank, 1 straight, or 1 right bank maneuver.

pilots.name: "Dutch" Vander
pilots.ability: After you perform the target lock action, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship may acquire a lock on the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.

pilots.name: "Echo"
pilots.ability: While you decloak, you must use the 2 left bank or 2 right bank template instead of the 2 straight template.
pilots.shipability: Stygium Array: After you decloak, you may perform an evade action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

pilots.name: "Howlrunner"
pilots.ability: When a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, that ship may reroll one attack die.

pilots.name: "Leebo"
pilots.ability: After you defend or perform an attack, if you spent a calculate token, gain 1 calculate token.
pilots.shipability: Sensor Blindspot: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0-1, do not apply the range 0-1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.

pilots.name: "Mauler" Mithel
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: "Night Beast"
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a blue maneuver you may perform a focus action.

pilots.name: "Pure Sabacc"
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if you have 1 or fewer damage cards, you may roll 1 additional attack die.
pilots.shipability: Adaptive Ailerons: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white 1 left bank, 1 straight, or 1 right bank maneuver.

pilots.name: "Redline"
pilots.ability: You can maintain 2 locks.After you perform an action, you may acquire a lock.

pilots.name: "Scourge" Skutu
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack against a defender in your bullesye firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: "Vizier"
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a speed 1 maneuver using your Adaptive Ailerons ship ability, you may perform a coordinate action. If you do, skip your Perform Action step.
pilots.shipability: Adaptive Ailerons: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white 1 bank left, 1 straight, or 1 bank right maneuver.

pilots.name: "Wampa"
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 charge to roll 1 additional attack die.After defending, lose 1 charge.

pilots.name: "Whisper"
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, gain 1 evade token.
pilots.shipability: Stygium Array: After you decloak, you may perform an evade action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

pilots.ability: While you defend, critical hit results are neutralized before hit results.
pilots.shipability: Locked and Loaded: While you are docked, after your carrier ship performs a primary forward firing arc or turret attack, it may perform a bonus primary rear firing arc attack.

pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Karsabi
pilots.ability: After you gain a disarm token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to remove 1 disarm token.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Kestal
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, after the defender rolls defense dice, you may spend 1 focus token to cancel all of the defender's blank/focus results.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Sai
pilots.ability: After you perform a coordinate action, if the ship you chose performed an action on your action bar, you may perform that action.

pilots.name: Lok Revenant
pilots.ability: None

pilots.name: Lothal Rebel
pilots.ability: None
pilots.shipability: Tail Gun: When you have a docked ship, you have a primary rear firing arc weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary forward firing arc attack value.

pilots.name: Lowhhrick
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 becomes the defender, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, that ship gains 1 evade token.

pilots.name: Luke Skywalker
pilots.ability: After you become the defender (before dice are rolled), you may recover 1 Force.

pilots.name: Maarek Stele
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender would be dealt a faceup damage card, instead draw 3 damage cards, choose 1, and discard the rest.
pilots.shipability: Advanced Targeting Computer: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 HIT result to a CRIT result.

pilots.name: Magva Yarro
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, the attacker cannot reroll more than 1 attack die.

pilots.name: Major Rhymer
pilots.ability: While you perform a torpedo or missile attack, you may increase or decrease the range requirement by 1, to a limit of 0-3.
pilots.shipability: Nimble Bomber: If you would drop a device using a straight template, you may use a left bank or right bank template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: Major Vermeil
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your blank or focus results to a hit result.
pilots.shipability: Adaptive Ailerons: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white 1 bank left, 1 straight, or 1 bank right maneuver.

pilots.name: Major Vynder
pilots.ability: While you defend, if you are disarmed, roll 1 additional defense die.

pilots.name: Manaroo
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer all green tokens assigned to you to that ship.

pilots.name: Miranda Doni
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or, if you are not shielded, you may roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

pilots.name: Moralo Eval
pilots.ability: If you would flee, you may spend 1 charge. If you do, place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of the edge of the play area that you fled from.

pilots.name: N'dru Suhlak
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Nashtah Pup
pilots.ability: You can deploy only via emergency deployment, and you have the name, initiative, pilot ability, and ship charge of the friendly, destroyed Hound's Tooth.Escape Craft: Setup: Requires the Hound's Tooth. You must begin the game docked with the Hound's Tooth.

pilots.ability: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 evade result to your dice results.
